job.command:
stardev cons
ln -s starsim.pythia8.C starsim.C
set seed_temp=`od -vAn -N4 -tu4 < /dev/urandom` set myseed=`expr ${seed_temp} % 10000000`
echo "Running with seed ${myseed}!" echo "Process number is ${JOBINDEX}" echo "Starting simulation..." echo ""
root4star -q -b starsim.C\(10000,${myseed}\)
echo "Finished detector simulation." echo ""
echo "Starting reconstruction." echo ""
root4star -b -q 'runSimBfc.C(10000,1,"pythia8")'
echo "Finished reconstruction." echo ""
mv pythia8.starsim.root pythia8.starsim_${JOBINDEX}.root mv SimpleTree.root SimpleTree_pythia8_${JOBINDEX}.root mv output_hadron_pythia8_e30_vz0_run1.root output_hadron_pythia8_e30_vz0_run${JOBINDEX}.root
